title: CA Certs errors

milestone.description: Enhancements and bug fixes expected to be included in the next main release.

body:
HI, I am getting errors each time i try to import my root CA certs into zap 2.4.3. This is required in order to test in a mutual ssl communication. the stack trace can be seen below...

`java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1
    at org.zaproxy.zap.extension.dynssl.SslCertificateUtils.parseDERFromPEM(Unknown Source)
    at org.zaproxy.zap.extension.dynssl.SslCertificateUtils.pem2Keystore(Unknown Source)
    at org.zaproxy.zap.extension.dynssl.DynamicSSLPanel.doImport(Unknown Source)
    at org.zaproxy.zap.extension.dynssl.DynamicSSLPanel.access$500(Unknown Source)
    at org.zaproxy.zap.extension.dynssl.DynamicSSLPanel$5.actionPerformed(Unknown Source)
    at javax.swing.AbstractButton.fireActionPerformed(AbstractButton.java:2022)
    at javax.swing.AbstractButton$Handler.actionPerformed(AbstractButton.java:2346)

    at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEventImpl(EventQueue.java:758)
    at java.awt.EventQueue.access$500(EventQueue.java:97)
    at java.awt.EventQueue$3.run(EventQueue.java:709)
    at java.awt.EventQueue$3.run(EventQueue.java:703)
    at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
    at java.security.ProtectionDomain$1.doIntersectionPrivilege(ProtectionDomain.java:75)

    at java.awt.WaitDispatchSupport$2.run(WaitDispatchSupport.java:184)
    at java.awt.WaitDispatchSupport$4.run(WaitDispatchSupport.java:229)
    at java.awt.WaitDispatchSupport$4.run(WaitDispatchSupport.java:227)
    at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
    at java.awt.WaitDispatchSupport.enter(WaitDispatchSupport.java:227)
    at java.awt.Dialog.show(Dialog.java:1084)

    at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEvent(EventQueue.java:728)
    at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpOneEventForFilters(EventDispatchThread.java:201)
    at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForFilter(EventDispatchThread.java:116)

Is there a way to do this from source?
